keywords.DESCRIPTION: Increase damage and #yBlock of a card by #b50%. Can be stacked multiplicatively. #yEnhance is removed after the card is played.
Remove an upgrade from a card to play a powerful card.
Prevent a card from being Exhausted once. Cannot be stacked.
Potency is the power of a rune when it is #yCrafted.
Create a rune using #yElements. If #yElements are insufficient, gain that much #yElements instead.
Elements(Ignis, Terra and Aqua) are spent to #yCraft runes and used for other utilities.
Destroy a rune and activate its effect twice. Passive effects will be removed at the start of your next turn.
Rune: Deals damage to ALL enemies.
Rune: Deals damage to random enemies.
Rune: Gain #yBlock.
#yRetain a card(s).
Gain #yThorns.
Gain #yPotency
Gain #yPlated #yArmor.
Give a random class card each turn.
give a random upgraded class card each turn.
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Heals on #yBreak.
No effect.
